00020 // sdk/util/FsTestDir.cpp ---
00021 //
00022 
00023 //
00024 #include "util/AffxString.h"
00025 #include "util/AptErrno.h"
00026 #include "util/Fs.h"
00027 #include "util/FsTestDir.h"
00028 
00029 //////////
00030 
00031 AptErr_t FsTestDir::setTestDir( const std::string & testcasepath, const bool clean, const int64_t bytescheck ) {
00032 
00033   AffxString requestTest(testcasepath);
00034   const std::string api_name = "FsTestDir::setTestDir";
00035   requestTest.strip();
00036   
00037   if( requestTest.isBlankOrEmpty() ) {
00038     return m_path.setErr(APT_ERR, api_name + ": testcasepath cannot be an empty string.");
00039   }
00040   FsPath test(requestTest);
00041   if ( test.isAbsolute() || (requestTest[0] == '.'))  {
00042     return m_path.setErr(APT_ERR, api_name + ": testcasepath cannont be an absolute path or start with \".\".");
00043   }
00044   if ( requestTest.length() < 3 ) {
00045     return m_path.setErr(APT_ERR, api_name + ": testcasepath must be 3 or more characters.");
00046   }
00047   
00048   std::string topdir;
00049 
00050   if (getenv("APT_TEST_DIR") != NULL)  {
00051     topdir = getenv("APT_TEST_DIR");
00052     if ( ! Fs::dirExists( topdir ) ){
00053       return m_path.setErr(APT_ERR, topdir + "..." + api_name + ", APT_TEST_DIR directory not found.");
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   if ( bytescheck > 0 ) {
00058     int64_t bytesfree = Fs::getFreeDiskSpace(topdir.empty()  ? "." : topdir);
00059     if ( bytescheck > bytesfree ) {
00060       std::string errmsg = api_name + ": byte check failed with bytes free \"" +
00061         ToStr(bytesfree) + "\" < \"" + ToStr(bytescheck) + "\" bytes requested.";
00062       return m_path.setErr(APT_ERR, errmsg);
00063     }
00064   }
00065 
00066   std::string completeDir;
00067   completeDir = Fs::join( topdir, APT_TEST_ROOT_DIR, requestTest );
00068 
00069 
00070   if ( Fs::dirExists( completeDir ) ) {
00071     if ( clean ) {
00072       Verbose::out(1, completeDir + ", " + api_name + " clean.");
00073       Fs::rm_rf(completeDir);
00074       Fs::mkdir(completeDir );
00075     }
00076     /// TODO: warn users directory exists?
00077   }
00078   else {
00079     Fs::mkdirPath(completeDir);
00080     Verbose::out(1, completeDir + ", " + api_name + ": directory created.");
00081   }
00082 
00083   
00084   AptErr_t aptErr = m_path.setDirPath(completeDir);
00085 
00086   if (aptErr == APT_OK) {
00087     std::string rootdir = Fs::join(topdir, APT_TEST_ROOT_DIR);
00088     std::string cmd=  "echo " + rootdir + "> " + APT_TEST_ROOT_DIR + ".txt";
00089     system(cmd.c_str());
00090 #ifndef _WIN32
00091     if ( ! Fs::exists(APT_TEST_ROOT_DIR) ) {
00092       symlink(rootdir.c_str(),  APT_TEST_ROOT_DIR.c_str());
00093     }
00094 #endif    
00095   }
00096 
00097   return aptErr;
00098 
00099 }
